name: UnderstandingHRwithJaySharp
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Understanding HR with Jay Sharp is the daily show that breaks down common HR topics. This show is show is designed for small business owners and leaders who want to grow their companies, but seem to spend too much time on changing rules/regulations or employee relations issues. In addition to offering daily tips on payroll, benefits, how to better organize, setup, or communicate with your team... Jay is also available and happy to serve as your Human Resources Business Partner.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
